offerId.description: When multiple offer items are sent to FareNet each in their own file, use offer Id as an identifier that they belong to the same offer.

description.description: Description and identifier for combined service pricing, e.g. hotel price includes flight fare (alphabetical order): HOTEL|JOURNEY, CAR|HOTEL|JOURNEY, JOURNEY, etc.

tripLength.description: For round trip flights, the tripLength is the number of days between first departure date and return date. For one way flights, the tripLength is the number of days between the hotel checkout date and the flight departure date.
